 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּץ‎</span>] **verb** ==be dispersed, scattered== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; perhaps akin to Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***break asunder, scatter***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָפוּצוּ‎</span> [[Ps.68.2|Ps 68:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָפֻצוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.48.16|Ezek 48:16]] +; 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּפוּצֶינָה‎</span> [[Ezek.34.5|Ezek 34:5]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְפוּצֶינָה‎</span> [[Zech.13.7|Zech 13:7]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֻּצוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.14.34|1Sam 14:34]] ***Participle*** ***passive*** plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּצַי‎</span> [[Zeph.3.10|Zeph 3:10]] (see below); — ***be dispersed, disperse***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעָם‎</span> [[1Sam.14.34|1Sam 14:34]] ***be scattered***, of enemies [[1Sam.11.11|1Sam 11:11]]; [[Num.10.35|Num 10:35]]; [[Ps.68.2|Ps 68:2]] of Israel (among nations) under figure of flock [[Ezek.34.5|Ezek 34:5]] (twice in verse); [[Zech.13.7|Zech 13:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּתפּֿוּצַי‎</span> [[Zeph.3.10|Zeph 3:10]] is probably corrupt, and v[[Zeph.3.9|Zeph 3:9]] v[[Zeph.3.10|Zeph 3:10]] gloss see [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW x (1890), 203</sup> [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Da|Da]]; of besieging army [[2Sam.20.22|2Sam 20:22]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל הָעִיר‎</span>); people from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) possessions [[Ezek.46.18|Ezek 46:18]] men (from Babel) [[Gen.11.4|Gen 11:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפ֫וֺצָה‎</span> [[Jer.10.21|Jer 10:21]], 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפֹ֫צוּ‎</span> [[Gen.10.18|Gen 10:18]] +, 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפֹצֹתֶם‎</span> [[Ezek.11.17|Ezek 11:17]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפ֫וֺצֶת‎</span> [[2Sam.18.8|2Sam 18:8]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפצות‎</span>) compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפֹצִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.17|1Kgs 22:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפוֺצִים‎</span> [[2Chr.18.16|2Chr 18:16]] — 

**1.** ***be scattered***, of army [[2Kgs.25.5|2Kgs 25:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> person) = [[Jer.52.8|Jer 52:8]]; [[1Kgs.22.17|1Kgs 22:17]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location) = [[2Chr.18.16|2Chr 18:16]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>), compare [[Jer.40.15|Jer 40:15]] (absolute); of dispersed Israel with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location [[Ezek.11.17|Ezek 11:17]]; [[Ezek.20.34|Ezek 20:34]]; [[Ezek.20.41|Ezek 20:41]]; [[Ezek.28.25|Ezek 28:25]], as flock [[Jer.10.21|Jer 10:21]]; [[Ezek.34.6|Ezek 34:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location), v[[Ezek.34.12|Ezek 34:12]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span>); Egyptians [[Ezek.29.13|Ezek 29:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמָּה‎</span>); of battle ***scattered*** over country by defeat [[2Sam.18.8|2Sam 18:8]]. 

**2.** ***be spread abroad***, of peoples [[Gen.10.18|Gen 10:18]].

**Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֵפִיץ‎</span> [[Deut.4.27|Deut 4:27]] +, 1 singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַהֲפִיצוֺתִי‎</span> [[Ezek.22.15|Ezek 22:15]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָפִיץ‎</span> [[Job.37.11|Job 37:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫פֶץ‎</span> [[Gen.11.8|Gen 11:8]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָפֵץ‎</span> [[Job.40.11|Job 40:11]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהָפִיץ‎</span> [[Ezek.20.23|Ezek 20:23]], etc.; — 

**1.** transitive ***scatter:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with accusative of person [[Gen.11.8|Gen 11:8]]; [[Gen.11.9|Gen 11:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location), [[Isa.41.16|Isa 41:16]]; [[Hab.3.14|Hab 3:14]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> [[Gen.49.7|Gen 49:7]] Israel among (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) nations [[Deut.4.27|Deut 4:27]]; [[Deut.28.64|Deut 28:64]]; [[Jer.9.15|Jer 9:15]]; [[Ezek.11.16|Ezek 11:16]]; [[Ezek.12.15|Ezek 12:15]]; [[Ezek.20.23|Ezek 20:23]]; [[Ezek.22.15|Ezek 22:15]]; [[Ezek.36.19|Ezek 36:19]]; [[Neh.1.8|Neh 1:8]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמ(הׅ‎</span> [[Deut.30.3|Deut 30:3]]; [[Jer.30.11|Jer 30:11]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location [[Ezek.34.21|Ezek 34:21]] absolute [[Jer.13.24|Jer 13:24]]; [[Jer.18.17|Jer 18:17]], under figure of flock [[Jer.23.1|Jer 23:1]]; [[Jer.23.2|Jer 23:2]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]]. reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲפִיצֵם‎</span> also [[Deut.32.26|Deut 32:26]] (see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פאה‎</span>]); Egyptians (c.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) [[Ezek.29.12|Ezek 29:12]]; [[Ezek.30.23|Ezek 30:23]]; [[Ezek.30.26|Ezek 30:26]] inhabitants of earth [[Isa.24.1|Isa 24:1]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** with accusative of thing, arrows (figurative for lightnings) [[2Sam.22.15|2Sam 22:15]] = [[Ps.18.15|Ps 18:15]]; [[Ps.144.6|Ps 144:6]] cloud [[Job.37.11|Job 37:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָפֵץ עַבְרוֺת אַפֶּ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Job.40.11|Job 40:11]] (i.e. lightnings ?); seed [[Isa.28.25|Isa 28:25]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֶהֱפִיצֻהוּ‎</span> [[Job.18.11|Job 18:11]] ***and drive him*** (si vera lectio, see conjecture in [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]). 

**2.** intransitive, ***scatter***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location [[Exod.5.12|Exod 5:12]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> person [[1Sam.13.8|1Sam 13:8]] of wind [[Job.38.24|Job 38:24]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location). 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּץ‎</span> **verb** ==flow, overflow== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flow***, compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 69</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָפוּצוּ‎</span> [[Prov.5.16|Prov 5:16]] of springs, figurative for sources of pleasure; 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּפוּצֶנָה עָרַי מִטוֺב‎</span> [[Zech.1.17|Zech 1:17]] ***my cities shall overflow with good.*** 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּצַץ‎</span>] **verb** ==break== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***break, break asunder***; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פצץ‎</span> ***break asunder***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***crush***); — 

**Po\`.** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפֹצֵץ סָ֑לַע‎</span> [[Jer.23.29|Jer 23:29]] a hammer which ***shatters rock.*** **Hithpo\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְפִּצְצוּ‎</span> [[Hab.3.6|Hab 3:6]] ***and*** the eternal mountains ***were shattered*** (elsewhere √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּץ‎</span> ***were scattered***). **Pilpel** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְפַצְפְּצֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.16.12|Job 16:12]] ***he*** [God] ***dashed me in pieces*** (figurative).
